lessons/embeddings.md:
# Building the Embed Pipeline

Premium deep dive into the embedding service and ingestion workflows.

- Optimize model loading and batching
- Index tuning (lists/probes) for pgvector
- Pagination and deduplication strategies
lessons/embeddings.title: Building the Embed Pipeline

lessons/intro.md:
# Welcome to Allie

This free lesson introduces the Allie course and the architecture of the embed pipeline you will build.

- Ingest YouTube transcripts
- Generate embeddings via Sentence Transformers
- Store vectors in Supabase (pgvector)
- Explore similarity search
lessons/intro.title: Welcome to Allie

lessons/setup.md:
# Setup: Supabase and Firebase

In this lesson, you will provision Supabase (for Postgres + pgvector) and Firebase (Auth + Functions + Firestore).

Steps:
- Create a Supabase project and run `allie/sql/schema.sql` in the SQL Editor.
- Create a Firebase project, enable Authentication and Firestore.
- Deploy functions in `firebase/functions` and set Stripe keys.
lessons/setup.title: Setup: Supabase, Firebase

lessons/stripe.md:
# Stripe Integration End-to-End

Premium lesson on integrating Stripe with Firebase Functions and gating premium content.

- Create Checkout Sessions
- Webhook handling for subscription lifecycle
- Firestore rules for premium gating
lessons/stripe.title: Stripe Integration End-to-End
